performance_metrics.name: Provisioning Time (Average)
performance_metrics.description: Average time taken to create a new server instance from request initiation to system availability. Measured across a representative sample of provisioning requests.

performance_metrics.name: Provisioning Throughput (Requests/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: Number of server instances provisioned per hour during peak load. Represents system capacity and efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Server Utilization (Average)
performance_metrics.description: Average CPU and memory utilization of provisioned servers. Indicates efficient resource allocation.

performance_metrics.name: Automation Success Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of provisioning requests that are successfully completed without manual intervention. Reflects automation accuracy.

performance_metrics.name: Error Rate (Provisioning)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of provisioning requests resulting in errors (e.g., resource conflicts, configuration issues). Indicates system stability.

implementation_requirements.specifications: Minimum 32 Cores, 128 GB RAM, 2 TB SSD Storage per Provisioning Server. Redundant Power Supplies (N+1) and Network Connectivity (10 Gbps minimum).

implementation_requirements.description: Allows integration with existing IT service management (ITSM) and orchestration systems.

implementation_requirements.name: Configuration Management
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated server configuration using templates and version control. Dynamic configuration based on request parameters.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures consistent and repeatable server deployments.

implementation_requirements.name: Monitoring & Logging
implementation_requirements.specifications: Real-time monitoring of server health, resource utilization, and API requests. Centralized logging for troubleshooting and auditing.
implementation_requirements.description: Provides visibility into the provisioning process and allows for rapid identification of issues.

implementation_requirements.name: Security
implementation_requirements.specifications: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), Encryption at Rest and in Transit, Regular Security Audits.
implementation_requirements.description: Protect sensitive data and ensure system integrity.
